Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A player the user control which moves around the map, fights Monsters while trying to keep health over 0, and can act against Monsters.
    Version:
    Apr 27, 2018
    Author:
    , Period: 4, Assignment: ApcsFinalProject, Sources:

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int r, int c, WorldMap w)
      Constructs player and lets them start somewhere on the grid
      Player(int r, int c, WorldMap w, int damage, int h, int b)
      Constructs player and lets them start somewhere on the grid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkDeath()
      Checks if player's health is at 0
      int getBaseDamage()
      Returns player's potential damage
      int getBlock()
      Returns block constant
      int getDamage()
      Calculates random damage player deals with an attack between 0.5 and 1.5 the base damage.

      Return's player's current health

      Return's the max health the player can reach

      Returns the column the player is on

      Returns the row the player is on

      Returns the count of steps (movements) the Player has done

      Returns the world the Player is in

      Increases block constant, max of 100

      Increases damage constant

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int r,
              int c,
              WorldMap w)
        Constructs player and lets them start somewhere on the grid
        Parameters:
        r - row number for player to start (begins at 0)
        c - column number for player to start (begins at 0)
        w - worldmap player spawns in

      • Player

        public Player(int r,
              int c,
              WorldMap w,
              int damage,
              int h,
              int b)
        Constructs player and lets them start somewhere on the grid
        Parameters:
        r - row number for player to start (begins at 0)
        c - column number for player to start (begins at 0)
        w - worldmap player spawns in
        damage - starting attack damage
        h - starting health
        b - block constant

      • lowerHealth

        public int lowerHealth(int d)
        Lowers the health of the player. If the health is lowered below 0, the health is set to 0
        Parameters:
        d - the amount to lower health by
        Returns:
        the Player's health after being lowered
